definition: Cancer (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
very large/huge/tremendous/gigantic
crab
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Cancer knits sweaters and makes fudge for the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座會爲鄰居織毛衣或者自制巧克力。

sentences.english: Cancerians have a deep love for home, and they truly treasure their friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人是個戀家控，他們視朋友家人爲珍寶。

sentences.english: Cancer is a very emotional sign.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座是一個易動感情的星座。

sentences.english: Cancers are easily upset which contributes to their reputation for moodiness.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座很容易悶悶不樂，因此他們以情緒起伏聞名。

sentences.english: The Cancer is more emotional creature but they are capable to feel pleasure from their relationships.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座更加情緒化，但能從他們的關係中得到快樂。

sentences.english: Cancers often choose one kind of taste in chocolate and rarely then change their minds.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座往往選擇一種口味的巧克力就很少再心猿意馬。

sentences.english: Pack your bags and travel far and wide, thanks to Mars in Cancer: October 1-15.
sentences.chinese: 一號到十五號火星在巨蟹座，整好旅行包到處漫遊吧。

sentences.english: For them sex is an emotional bond that they form with their lover.
sentences.chinese: 對巨蟹座來說，性生活是維繫他和愛人情感的紐帶。

sentences.english: Cancer lovers have a highly developed sense of touch.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座愛人對愛撫高度敏感。

sentences.english: The fourth sign of the Zodiac, Cancer the Crab is ruled by the restless Moon.
sentences.chinese: 黃道十二宮的第四宮是由月亮統治的巨蟹座。

sentences.english: Cancer stays at home and gives candy to the other trick-or- treaters .
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座老老實實地待在家裏等着給來搗鬼的人糖喫。

sentences.english: This sign loves cookies, candy, and ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人酷愛曲奇餅，糖果和冰激凌。

sentences.english: Cancer belongs to a group of signs which astrologers call water signs.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座屬於星相學家們定義的水象星座。
